# Accounting & Audit â€“ Regulatory Constraints

## Mandatory Constraints
- Financial records must be immutable after period close.
- Regulatory reports must reflect finalized accounting data.
- Adjustments must follow formal correction procedures.

## Compliance Expectations
- Deterministic calculations
- Transparent classification logic
- Retention policies aligned with regulation

## Forbidden
- Retroactive modification of closed periods
- Non-reproducible financial calculations
- Inconsistent reporting across channels
